showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ too friendly including the manager. The kid that was cleaning the showers did a horrible job I had to ask him to come back and clean the toilet because it was obvious that he didn't wipe it down at all. There was still paper on the ‚Ä¶

Not really the best location. Short handed on employees, shower floors still has toenail clippings and hair on the sink! The smallest parking lot . The only person who was great was Lori ‚ù§Ô∏è She was very helpful and kind! She's the only ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ wrote anything about being clean at this truck stop because in every sense of the word they are far from clean the showers are absolutely disgusting there's so much dirt and build up in the corners even on the countertop by the sink in the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ candy to eat. Reasonably close to the highway but not so close that the noise will keep a sleeping trucker awake. Shower availability seems good, but if you want a place to park for the night get in early since the parking fills up quick.

‚Ä¶ restaurant that that was here is no longer here. They are replacing it but employees have no idea what‚Äôs going in it‚Äôs place. Shower 2 leaks so bad at the shower head that it sprays the entire bathroom. Also it seems the A/C is broke in the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ disrespect from a business. Manager needs to learn how to deal with the public,  he needs to be thankful my wife was by my side, I would have no regrets making him swallow a mouthful of teeth and getting my free shower in the local jail.

The shower was hot. But showers need up dating !
And  get Handicap shower back up to code.
Fuel area needs to be cleaned up.

$21.95 for truck parking is utterly ridiculous! They have more reserved than regular parking, wth! All the reserved slot are "prime parking", for this price it should  come with a free shower, meal & a lot lizard! üòú ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ going to this store for only two months becuz I new to the area and I only go there to heat up food and take a shower and I pay for my showers  I thought  everything was ok until I had a manager come up to me and  talk to us about how ‚Ä¶

Worst pilot I‚Äôve been to no toilet paper,no coffee because it has to be filled up with grains,no shower available because they‚Äôre just two working at front she told me and they couldn‚Äôt clean it lol

showerReviews.reviewText: these days it's hard to find a good truck stop for place to rest, shower and grab a warm meal but this place has the winning combination. Great service friendly staff. Food was great. Restaurant Open 24hrs. Down side truck parking lot is ‚Ä¶

Nice Spot to rest /Fuel/Shower $13.00 - leave a tip üôÇ, etc . Hot shower, clean,good pressure. Nice employes.  Good Food.  No complaints. Actually have pimento cheese sandwiches ü•™ üòã. That was a first and plenty of cheese üëç+ Fresh ! ‚Ä¶
Very nice little truck stop.  At all 3 of their truck stops the staff are very friendly! This one is very new. The shower was very nice and new! ‚Ä¶

I park here all the time when I visit my sister and everyone that I have encountered here that works are professional and very nice the food is great haven't yet had to shower there but the store and bathrooms are very clean.  Even though I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ As we do at all truck stops, you ask for 2 showers, one of which is to be a team shower. At most other truck stops you fuel 50 gals and get a free shower (with team shower added in). Here, to get a shower its 75 gals. No big deal. We got ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Terrible inconsiderate owners ! She kicked me off the property after I paid for gas and took a shower ! I wasn't in the way and I just needed to check out my trailer lights , they had me pull out of the gas station without trailer lights! ‚Ä¶
I didn't have enough am bucks for a shower  they were so nice they gave me a shower. So sweet and good food. The place is brand new.spotless nice showers laundry   .nice
Great place. Super clean and hot shower for only 11. (And I'm a clean freak). Tons of options for eating and snacks.
Been to 46 states... never found a shower this clean and nice...

showerReviews.reviewText: Not a bad truck stop at all. I‚Äôve done several 34‚Äôs here with no complaints. It is smaller so shower waits can be long but the people are friendly and it‚Äôs clean.

I won't ever stop here again period!!!! I got in line for a shower today waiting about 15 minutes then just as I got inside the store heading to my shower this lady working there asking me what shower I was in I told her then she told me ‚Ä¶

Twice today, I tried to get a shower here. Earlier I was told there was 2 showers with one ahead of me. After an hour, the other driver went over to see that one shower door was open and empty while the employees were grabbing away in the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ with my Gorilla wife. As a result I retreated across to the Oklahoma state line to discover this beautiful Loves after such little amount of sleep. I was able to discover the showers and hear the beautiful phrase ‚Äúyour shower is ready‚Äù.

Lovely crews, Clean Facility. They only have 2 shower so far but the turn around very fast (except when they occupied).  Well organized.  Please drivers let‚Äôs put the trash on the trash bin. They have plenty. Safe travel
My only problem is that the shower wait is crazy. I've been the next for a shower for literally an hour
Cleanest Loves shower I've seen yet..  Got a tire fixed here as well,, the shop guys are great..
One of the better Loves out there. Why? Low fuel prices compared to other Loves, nice shower facilities, AND parking available even after midnight !
Been waiting hours for a shower. Apparently they only use one. Ive been here 5 times and every time ive left without a shower. Simply ridiculous.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ here so I can not comment on the quality or pricing of the food. I did shower, the water temperature is as hot as you can take it. But the pressure is intermittent and the temperature setting fluctuates either randomly or when someone ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ job of keeping it up. A full service restaurant open 24/7 good food. Today, 12-9-2020, they gave me a FREE, YES FREE SHOWER, so I left a $2 tip.  We got here just after 2:30 a.m. and found a parking spot.  Friendly people. Thanks HILLTOP!!! ‚Ä¶

Workman's never disappoints. The food is delicious and reasonably priced. The shower was AMAZING. I love when companies have a hand held shower head. Makes me actually feel clean and a bit pampered. Hard to feel that on the road. The decor ‚Ä¶
Large parking lot, hot shower, and the biggest pulled pork sandwich I think I have ever had. Yeah, great place.
managed 106 gallons and you have to pay for the shower that's a shame
Friendly staff, beautiful shower, great food, laundry for a buck!!!!!!! What's not to üíò love. ‚Ä¶
I am so glad I found this place. I was running out of hours, and I found parking, shower and great food.
Good food shower 1 ok but water presser goes in and out clean lots of food fly problem in dinner

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ hours. She explained they had spoken less than 45 min ago. His response was ‚Äúyou probably took a shower and got confused‚Äù whatever that means. I usually make it a point to go to Pilot/Flying J as I‚Äôve always had quality service. This one ‚Ä¶

The parking is always bad here because it's probably one of the only few truck stops in this city. However the shower and toilet in the shower room makes up for it. Nice water pressure, decent sized shower room and fat friendly toilet.

Came for a shower it was clean thank god! Bad part is I‚Äôm sweating the entire time I‚Äôm getting dressed. It‚Äôs no ac inside the bathroom with the showers just a FAN! THAT ISN‚ÄôT ENOUGH please fix this problem. I paid almost $20 to be back ‚Ä¶

CLEANEST SHOWER I HAVE SEEN IN MONTHS! There wasn't even a spec of dust in the fan!  ATTENTION WEARY TRAVELERS!! Forget your misconceptions of "truck stops" and don't "settle" for a rest area. (Not in a semi? You are allowed to park ‚Ä¶

No hot water yet again. Who the hell wants to take shower in this freezing water when it‚Äôs in the 40‚Äôs outside with the air conditioning on. Y‚Äôall are nuts. This is why people get sick. Fix your hot water if not keeps the showers closed

‚Ä¶ a keeper. Wonderful warm sincere greeting.  Took my shower grabbed a salad and she was busy with paperwork but asked if she could help me and rang me up‚Ä¶again with that sincere smile.  She is professional and efficient. I will make ‚Ä¶

90% of the truck parking is paid. There was 0 unpaid spots available at 1pm on a Thursday and a 1 hour wait for a shower. Used to come here years ago and it was halfway decent. Now it‚Äôs an overused garbage dump that aims to extort drivers ‚Ä¶

Shower is clean‚Ä¶
Parking always full ..
is not bad..

Normal PFJ with a dennys. Nice people here on a Saturday the shower guy was running his Azz off trying to get as many in and out as he could. But he needs to be a bit more observant as you see in the picture other then that all is nice. Bob ‚Ä¶

130 parking about 20 of them is free $24  for parking shower is really filthy and bathroom was super nasty customer service was horrible and the security guard don't know how to talk to people very rude no sign say reserved parking but they ‚Ä¶
